subject: AI & Agents
title: Delimiters: Separating Instructions from Data
description: A short lesson to help you apply Delimiters: Separating Instructions from Data.

hook.text: Your prompt says 'summarize this' but the model executes the user's text as instructions.

buildup.text: Without clear boundaries, models mix instructions with input data.

discovery.text: Use delimiters like triple quotes, XML tags, or markdown to isolate sections.
